scripts.postinstall: concurrently -n scripts,server,client "npm --prefix scripts install" "npm --prefix server install" "npm --prefix client install"
scripts.start: concurrently -n scripts,server,client "npm --prefix scripts start" "npm --prefix server start" "npm --prefix client start"
